channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus -- Micro Focus Content Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus -- Micro Focus Content Manager

item.title: CVE-2019-3489|2024-08-04T19:12:09.499Z -- micro%20focus -- micro%20focus%20content%20manager
item.description: An unauthenticated file upload vulnerability has been identified in the Web Client component of Micro Focus Content Manager 9.1, 9.2, and 9.3 when configured to use the ADFS authentication method. The vulnerability could be exploited by an unauthenticated remote attacker to upload content to arbitrary locations on the Content Manager server.
